thread.title: Pentagon Looks to Colorado Prisons for Gitmo Detainees
thread.title_full: Pentagon Looks to Colorado Prisons for Gitmo Detainees - WSJ

author: Gordon Lubold
title: Pentagon Looks to Colorado Prisons for Gitmo Detainees
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Pentagon is eyeing at least two prisons in Colorado as potential sites to house terrorism suspects as the Obama administration scrambles to find a politically viable approach to closing its detention center at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
The Defense Department plans to send a team of officials to at least two facilities in Colorado, including the high-security prison called ADX Florence, also known as Supermax, which houses...
